meanings.sent2: I often misunderstand what my teacher says.
meanings.sent3: It's funny how I always misunderstand jokes.
meanings.sent4: Her accent made it easy to misunderstand her words.
meanings.sent5: I hope you don't misunderstand my intentions.

meanings.sent3: I tend to misunderstand movie plots.
meanings.sent4: His silence could be easily misunderstood as anger.
meanings.sent5: It's easy to misunderstand someone when you don't listen carefully.
